title: Flint fire Starter Survival Emergency Waterproof fire Maker Camping kit 2 Pack high Heat Sparks
features: Compact fire starter flint is weather resistant, cold resistant, windproof. and waterproof
Strikes up to 15,000 times to make a fire 2,980-degree C spark in any weather, bright embers also work well as an emergency signal.
Survival and emergency essential signal spark, camping and hunting lighter necessity
Perfect for traditional alcohol and modern gas stoves, bonfire, BBQ or your camp kitchen
Durable, high visibility, bright orange handles make it hard to lose. Two striker/flints set.
description: The Fire Starter Flint 2 pack combines two pieces of survival gear in one compact fire maker. The fire starter kit includes a waterproof magnesium fire starter stick, and a large steel striker tethered together on a lanyard for safe keeping. Built to last, it is weather resistant, cold resistant, windproof. and waterproof. Great fire starting flint lights up to 15,000 times, and is an essential for outdoor activities including camping, hiking, fishing, hunting, and as part of your emergency survival supplies. Perfect for traditional alcohol and modern gas stoves bonfire of BBQ. while you hunt or in your camp kitchen. No need for a match sticks, this lighter provides 2,980-degree C spark in any weather, at any altitude

Shave a small amount of magnesium from the rod onto your tinder using the serrated side of the striker knife. Next, hold the rod at an angle over the pile and forcefully slide your striker along the length of the rod until sparks land directly on the magnesium shavings and ignite the fire. For best results, strip the protective layer of paint from the striker before starting your fire.
